fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Outsider: You appear to not win with Order. Affects up to Uncertain checks. 
- Targets: By the end of Night 2, select X players to Kill. You may pick 1 backup target. X = (2 + Players/8, Rounded)
- Bloodlust: For every player you Kill, heal 1 HP.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Mark: Choose a player. The next Attacking card to be played this phase will target them instead. [3 uses, 1 CD] 
- Rage: Gain a random non-Special Attacking card immediately. [Infinite uses, 2 CD]
- Stalk: Follow a player into the Room they enter tonight. [2 uses, 2 CD, Day-Only] 
- Steamroll: Deal 2 HP Unblockable damage to a player at the end of the phase. Gain a use every 3 players you Kill. [1 use, 2 CD, Recharging, 0/3]

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill your assigned X Players by the end of the Execution Event.
